preview: Summergarden is a free, first-come first-serve held every week in the Museum of Modern Art’s Sculpture Garden.
contents: Summergarden is a free, first-come first-serve held every week in the Museum of Modern Art’s Sculpture Garden. Since 1971, the concert series presents classical and jazz music.
